title: First post
content:
##My very first blog

Hello world, after delays of several months due to personal reasons, the blog is finally established.

This blog will be in both Chinese and English, and most of the posts will be study notes on programming mainly, but also some college course stuffs. Maybe I will create a photograph catergory that shows some good shooting of mineðŸ˜†.

BTW, the Markdown editing software I used is called Typora, it can show instant result of your Markdown typing. I used it to drop notes during classed for a semester already, it is a really good software, worth a try.
